                  try
                  {
                        if( $Options->get_setting( 'upload_file' , false ) )
                        {
                              global      $extension_whitelist;
                              $extension_whitelist = explode( ',' , $Options->get_setting( 'extensions' , 'pdf,jpg,jpeg,gif,bmp,png,doc,docx,ppt,pptx,rtf,xls,xslx,tif,tiff,zip,7zp,gz,gz2' ) );
                              
                              global      $save_path;
                              $PackagePath = _get_package_relative_path_ex( 'file_input' , '2.2.0' );
                              $save_path = $PackagePath.'/data/';
                              
                              global      $file_name;
                              
                              define( 'NO_DIRECT_CALL' , 1 );
                              require_once( $PackagePath.'/include/php/upload.php' );
                              
                              $EventManager = get_package( 'event_manager' , 'last' , __FILE__ );
                              $EventManager->trigger_event( 'on_load_file' , array( 'file_path' => $save_path.$file_name ) );

                              return;
                        }

Definition at line 223 of file file_input.php.

            {
                  try
                  {
                        $MacroParameters = '';
                        
                        $ProcessingString = str_replace( '{file_input}' , '{file_input:f=1}' , $ProcessingString );
                        
                        for( ; $MacroParameters = $this->String->get_macro_parameters( $ProcessingString , 'file_input' ) ; )
                        {
                              $this->BlockSettings->load_settings( $MacroParameters );
                              $Name = $this->BlockSettings->get_setting( 'name' , 'file_input' );
                              $Type = $this->BlockSettings->get_setting( 'file_types' , 'default' );
                              
                              if( $Type == 'default' )
                              {
                                    $FileExtensions = '*.pdf,*.jpg;*.jpeg;*.gif;*.bmp;*.png;*.doc;*.docx;*.ppt;*.pptx;*.rtf;*.xls;*.xslx;*.tif;*.tiff';
                                    $FileDescription = 'Supported types';
                              }
                              elseif( $Type == 'zip' )
                              {
                                    $FileExtensions = '*.zip;*.7zip;*.gz;*.gz2';
                                    $FileDescription = 'Zip archives';
                              }
                              elseif( $Type == 'all' )
                              {
                                    $FileExtensions = '*.*';
                                    $FileDescription = 'All files';
                              }
                              
                              if( $this->Security->get_gp( $Name , 'set' ) )
                              {
                                    $Code = $this->CachedMultyFS->file_get_contents( dirname( __FILE__ ).'/res/templates/file_field.tpl' );
                                    $Code = str_replace( '{name}' , $Name , $Code );
                                    $Code = str_replace( '{file_name}' , basename( $this->Security->get_gp( $Name , 'string' ) ) , $Code );
                                    $Code = str_replace( '{file_name}' , $this->Security->get_gp( $Name , 'string' ) , $Code );
                              }
                              else
                              {
                                    $Code = $this->CachedMultyFS->file_get_contents( dirname( __FILE__ ).'/res/templates/file_input.tpl' );
                                    
                                    $Code = str_replace( '{file_types}' , $FileExtensions , $Code );
                                    $Code = str_replace( '{file_types_description}' , $FileDescription , $Code );
                                    
                                    $Code = str_replace( '{file_size_limit}' , $this->BlockSettings->get_setting( 'file_size_limit' , '512 KB' ) , $Code );
                                    
                                    if( $this->BlockSettings->get_setting( 'single_input' , false ) == '1' )
                                    {
                                          $Code = str_replace( '{file_upload_limit}' , 1 , $Code );
                                          $Code = str_replace( '{file_queue_limit}' , 1 , $Code );
                                          $Path = _get_package_relative_path_ex( 'file_input' , '2.2.0' ).'/data';
                                          $Code = str_replace( '{upload_complete_processor}' , "function( Data ){jQuery( '#id_$Name' ).attr( 'style' , 'display: none;' );jQuery( '#id_$Name' ).after( '<span id=\'span_$Name\'>' + Data.name + '<input type=\'hidden\' name=\'$Name\' value=\'$Path/' + Data.name + '\'></span>' );}" , $Code );
                                    }
                                    else
                                    {
                                          $Code = str_replace( '{file_upload_limit}' , $this->BlockSettings->get_setting( 'file_upload_limit' , 0 ) , $Code );
                                          $Code = str_replace( '{file_queue_limit}' , $this->BlockSettings->get_setting( 'file_queue_limit' , 0 ) , $Code );
                                          $Code = str_replace( '{upload_complete_processor}' , 'uploadComplete' , $Code );
                                    }
                              }
                              
                              $Code = str_replace( '{name}' , $Name , $Code );
                              
                              $ProcessingString = str_replace( "{file_input:$MacroParameters}" , $Code , $ProcessingString );
                              $Changed = true;
                        }
                        
                        return( $ProcessingString );
                  }
                  catch( Exception $e )
                  {
                        $Args = func_get_args();_throw_exception_object( __METHOD__ , $Args , $e );
                  }
            }
